fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, select a player to Raid at night.
- Fully heal your longship. (Costs 4 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A menu similar to (92) Pirate will appear for both players, with attack and defense options each corresponding to one another (but it’s Viking themed).
- A successful raid will either generate 4 gold, deal a Powerful attack to the target, or delete one of your target’s abilities. This is random.
- A failed raid will deal one damage to your longship. If it takes three damage, you will be dealt an Overkill attack.
- Raided players are super-roleblocked.
- Healing is a night ability that restores your longship’s health to 3 and gives you Powerful defense for the night. You may only heal if you do not raid anyone.
- Detection immune

fields.name: Weapons:
fields.value:
- Attack: Battleaxe, Spear, Bow
- Defense: Armor, Shield, Agility
- Battleaxe beats Armor, Spear beats Shield, Bow beats Agility

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value: “They were plundered by Norse Vikings.” (Factional Kill or Plunder Kill)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
- Host can create messages for each weapon interaction as they choose. 
- Rock paper scissors is a great mechanic
